brooklyn.entity.rebind
[Java] Class RebindManagerImpl

java.lang.Object
  brooklyn.entity.rebind.RebindManagerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
RebindManager
public class RebindManagerImpl

Manages the persistence/rebind process.

Lifecycle is to create an instance of this, set it up (e.g. setPeriodicPersistPeriod(Duration), setPersister(BrooklynMementoPersister); however noting that persist period must be set before the persister).

Usually done for you by the conveniences (such as the launcher).
